title: Collaborative English/Korean Job Learning Process Using Interlingual Learning Spaces

context.prior_knowledge: English or Korean proficiency at B2/C1 level
context.additional_context: A language exchange program designed to enhance practicing professionals' adaptability in multinational work environments

learning_goals: Learners can use 50 Korean/English workplace expressions contextually with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete three language-specific practical tasks in collaboration with peers in a blended learning environment.
Learners achieve intercultural understanding skills of at least 3 out of 4 points in formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
